text:
CAL ME MAYBE Chelsea transfer news: Hakan Calhanoglu closing in on Stamford Bridge switch this summer 
Reports in Turkey suggest Bayer Leverkusen star - who is missing the rest of the season through suspension - is set to sign for Blues Gossip Comments HAKAN CALHANOGLU is closing in on a summer switch to Chelsea, according to reports in Turkey. 
The playmaker was quoted as saying “God willing, I will be a Chelsea player next season” by newspaper Fanatik . Reuters 3 Leverkusen star Hakan Calhanoglu has been banned for the rest of the season 
And Turkish-Football suggest the Blues and Bayer Leverkusen were in talks over Calhanoglu, claiming a source told them a deal was close. Keep up to date with ALL the Chelsea news, gossip, transfers and goals on our club page plus fixtures, results and live match commentary 
Calhanoglu would be a more than capable replacement for Oscar after the Brazilian completed a £60million switch to Shanghai SIPG in January. EPA Hakan Calhanoglu has revealed he wishes to become ‘the Turkish Mesut Ozil’ Shanghai Sipg 3 Chelsea have plenty of cash to burn after Shanghai SIPG signed Oscar for £60million at the end of last month 
The German born Turkish international is sitting out the rest of Leverkusen’s season due to a four-month ban. 
Trabzonspor in his homeland lodged a claim with Fifa in 2013 that Calhanoglu had agreed to sign for them from Karlsruhe in 2011. 
He ultimately stayed in Germany before joining Leverkusen but the Turkish outfit claim his representative dad took an £86,000 payment from them – something the player and his father deny. The row continued for several years before Fifa announced the suspension last week. 
Leverkusen sports director Rudi Voeller said: “We cannot comprehend it’s a big blow for Hakan and us. 
“Although Bayer Leverkusen had nothing to do with this it is also punished. 
“Now we will miss an important player during a key part of the season.” 
Calhanoglu is a dead-ball specialist with a sledgehammer of a strike, who can also play in team-mates. Hakan Calhanoglu scores amazing free kick in Turkey friendly
